sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; class Vaastu extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' let imagealt = 'image' return (

  • 19 Dcember 2024

Vastu Purush Mandala And Devata

According to mythology, there was a fierce battle between Lord Shankar and the demon Andhakasura, in this war, some drops of sweat came out from the body of Shiva and the demon and a creature with a huge face were born. Seeing whom everyone started running here and there in fear. Then at the behest of Brahma ji, all the gods together pressed him to the ground and 45 gods sat on his body so that all his activities could be stopped. Because of the abode of all the deities, Brahmaji named it Vastu Purush.

Vastu Purush Mandala

The Vastu Purush Mandal is a key component of Vastu Shastra and refers to the spiritual design of a building, incorporating supernatural forces and the influence of celestial bodies. Mathematically, the diagrammatic representation of an architectural design incorporates the movements of stars and planets.

Vastu Purush Devata

Vastu Purush is arranged by 45 deities, and the whole universe descends on the earth. Brahma, Vishnu, Mahesh, ten Dikpalas, and 45 deities are all seated on the body of Vastu Purush.

To do any construction work, to please the 45 gods, worship should be done according to the rules and regulations.

Devas sitting on its body is a symbol of stabilization. Stable and hard earth is the best for laying the foundation of any building. Whenever we construct a house, building, office, school, pond, temple, factory, or business place, the presence of Vastu Purush is present everywhere.

Brahma - the supreme creator of the universe and the lord of the center of the building/Brahmasthan place.

Bhudhar –His place is in the north and he is the creator of manifestation and attainments.

Aryama –who works to connect everyone with the material world. The groom does the work of uniting the bride and taking the process of development forward.

Viviswan –It controls change and drives the process forward. Their place is in the south direction.

Mitra – They are the motivators and have the power of stimulation which can bind the world together. Their place is in the west direction.

Aap –He has all kinds of healer's powers. Which increases immunity. Gives strength to face troubles. Gives strength and vision to humans. All the zodiac signs of water remain active only because of them.

Aapvats –You give plans and Aapvatas gives you the ability to carry out these plans. These gods give power to medicines to fight diseases. Increases body and immunity.

Savita –It increases the power of meditation. This power helps in solving problems. The person gets the willpower and inspiration to start any work which motivates him to move forward.

Savitra –Gayatri Mantra is the power of this energy. Shree Yantra is auspicious here. They give the power and ability of determination in every work. Which inspires the person to move forward in every situation.

Indra –This god is the primary god and protector of wealth. They give the power of pregnancy and protect at the time of delivery. This power gives long life with the power to think, develop, and live life.

Jay –He gives victory in life with weapons. Gives skill with work efficiency. Learning books and equipment are kept here.

Rudra –He maintains the flow of all activities in life. Goods and food items can be kept here. Helping to balance the body and emotions, this direction is best for crying.

Rajayakshma –This deity gives strength and grip by giving support and power. When it is unbalanced, the mind becomes unstable.

Aditi –She is a peacemaker and a force of protection and helps in maintaining integrity.

Diti –This energy gives the ability to express visionary and liberal thinking. Gives the ability to develop a vision to see the real truth of life and the real form of nature.

Shikhi –This energy gives the power to express thoughts and influence the world with thoughts. It is the origin of all-powerful thoughts.

Prajanya –This energy is the source of the origin of all vegetation. When one meditates here, the insight and curiosity of the mind get satisfied and the insights increase.

Bhishma –This energy helps in bringing out new things by rubbing two things like gravity.

Akash –It gives direction to reveal the inner mind and increases the energy inside.

Anil –This energy is related to Vayudev. This energy gives strength and inspiration to move forward in difficult tasks and situations.

Pusha –This energy enhances strength and nutrition. If it is balanced, it helps to avoid accidents in travel, helps in getting back lost money, and gives insight into choosing a partner for yourself.

Bhringraj –This energy is going to save us from discrimination. What remains after the end of this knowledge is the place of energy.

Mrug – This energy gives curiosity to find and investigate something.

Pitra –This is the energy associated with the ancestors. This direction provides all the means and sources of happiness for its existence.

Dauvarik –This energy gives traditional knowledge related to talent, infinity, and heritage. Gives the ability to retain old knowledge.

Shosha –This is the dry direction where the emotions are dried by Rudra. If you are feeling stressed in your mind, then by staying here for some time or crying a little, all the negative feelings and depression will go away.

Papikshma –This direction is the direction of addictions, drugs, diseases, and the weakening of the mind. The person keeps on finding out the mistakes of others and gets separated from society due to which he takes the help of addictions and drugs.

Rog –This direction gives strength to the weak power and destroys the diseases and gives strength. Gives support and strength in difficult times.

Naag –Here an emotionally weak person gets pleasure and gets satisfaction from longing and craving.

Jayant –This direction brings victory and success in all endeavors and refreshes the mind and body. Gives the enthusiasm to execute new ideas in the person.

Mahendra –This is the vital energy to develop the power of cooperation among the people.

Surya –It gives vision and observation power to the eyes. Ability to control and system.

Satya –This energy gives authenticity, credibility, and prestige. The ability to analyze anything develops inside the person.

Vithth –This energy is associated with untruth, lies, pretense, and hypocrisy. In which the person is not able and healthy and can make positive use of this energy.

Grihaksha – This is the energy that controls the mind. This energy defines the boundaries of the mind and all its functions.

Yama –This energy means self-control and moral duty. This energy regulates the balance of the world.

Gandharva –This energy preserves the human body by giving life force from Samaras. Which removes all the important nutrients of the food.

Sugriva –This energy gives the power to achieve beauty and to make all subjects easily understandable and achievable. For the practice of knowledge, you get power and method.

Pushpadanta –This direction is the energy of the assistant. This is Kubera's vehicle whose qualities are expansion and blossoming. When this direction is balanced, all the wishes of prosperity, growth, and development in life are fulfilled.

Varuna – This energy oversees and controls the world. It controls the tendency of human emotions.

Asura –These are the deities of magic and illusory powers that give spirituality and spiritual depth.

Mukhya –This power is related to protection. It is the main of all the energies that are related to the process of expression and purpose of any building.

Bhallav –This is the power of abundance. It enhances all efforts and their results. If you want to achieve something big in life, then balance this direction.

Som –This is Kuber's throne i.e. energy of treasure. Gives the power to get profit in business and protect from enemies.

Bhujag –It is the energy of immunity-boosting and life-saving medicines. This is the direction of attraction. Ensures the unhindered flow of wealth and health.

Conclusion

It is said that the deities absorb negative energy from your home. However, you can also add Vastu Purush Mandal to your co-commercial workspace. It brings harmony among the employees and customers for peaceful business operations. If you want to get more information about Vastu Purush Mandala and Devata, then Online Astrology Consultations will help you.

) } } export default Vaastu;
